SEARCH
Package seasofyore.core

Class PlayerQuadrant

java.lang.Object
seasofyore.core.PlayerQuadrant
public class PlayerQuadrant extends Object
Represents the player's quadrant in the Seas of Yore game. Manages the grid state, ship placement, and interactions within the quadrant.

  • Method Details

    • eraseCells

      public void eraseCells()
      Resets the PlayerQuadrant so that all cells become WATER_CELL (empty)

    • validHeading

      public boolean validHeading(Ship ship, ShipHeading heading)
      Validates whether a ship's heading is within bounds and does not overlap with existing ships.
      Parameters:
      ship - the ship to validate
      heading - the heading of the ship
      Returns:
      true if the heading is valid; false otherwise

    • placeShip

      public boolean placeShip(Ship ship, ShipHeading heading)
      Places a ship in the quadrant if the heading is valid.
      Parameters:
      ship - the ship to place
      heading - the heading of the ship
      Returns:
      true if the ship was successfully placed; false otherwise

      y - the y-coordinate of the cell
      Returns:
      true if the cell is within bounds; false otherwise
